channel.title: Alive Today with Shavar
channel.description:
Past and present sermons and powerful biblical preaching and teachings from former actor-turned pastor Shavar Ross.
Shavar is best remembered as a child actor. He played "Dudley", Gary Coleman's best friend on the hit 1980's television show "Diff'rent Strokes". Shavar, now 34, has been an actor for well over 20 years and has starred in over 100 film and episodic television productions such as Magnum P. I., MacGyver, Friday The 13th Part 5, Chicago Hope, Designing Women, The Bold and the Beautiful, What's Love Got To Do With It?, Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air, Family Matters, and many more.
After completing 4 years of biblical studies at The Ministry Training Institute, an auxiliary of one of the largest churches in Los Angeles, Shavar founded The Alive Church in which he pastored for 4 years.
Currently Shavar is a film director, writer and producer and still enjoys inspiring others through his fiery preaching sermons.
channel.itunes:author: Shavar Ross

item.title: Idols and The Spirit of Compromise
item.description: From The Alive Church in North Hollywood, California. February 7, 1999. Are there idols in your life? Pastor Shavar Ross preaches and teaches on the importance of getting rid of the strongholds in your life.
item.itunes:author: Shavar Ross
item.itunes:summary: From The Alive Church in North Hollywood, California. February 7, 1999. Are there idols in your life? Pastor Shavar Ross preaches and teaches on the importance of getting rid of the strongholds in your life.

item.title: A Prayer for You: Financial Breakthrough
item.description:
Be warned! This simple audio prayer may change your life! Today I felt like saying a prayer for you, whoever you are, in the area of FINANCES.
However, be warned, as this prayer may not be for you. It is no accident that you stumbled upon this podcast. Prayer works no matter what you believe. If it's not for you, just trash it; I certainly have no problems with that. You may be here for other reasons. But know this, God has a purpose and plan for your life that only he understands and he'd like to share with you his plan for life. Hogwash you say? Alright, I'll prove it to you. 1. Click the play button and listen to the simple prayer. 2. Ask God if he's "really real" to reveal himself to you in ANY way as a sign because you sought him by simply listenin' to my prayer. Do those 2 things and I guarantee you God will reveal himself to you in such a way that you'll have to come back and tell me what happened to you as a result of your efforts. You see, all you have to do is take a step, God will take two. So holla back and let me know what's up! I don't pray no wimpy prayers so I'm expecting somethin'. Are you?
Foundation Scripture: Matthew 18: 18, 19
18 "I tell you the truth, whatever you bind on earth will be[d]bound in heaven, and whatever you loose on earth will be[e] loosed in heaven.
19 "Again, I tell you that if two of you on earth agree about anything you ask for, it will be done for you by my Father in heaven."

item.title: The Drew Marshall Interview
item.description:
From July 15, 2006, Shavar ministers on the Drew Marshall Show.
The Drew Marshall Show, Canada's most listened to spiritual talkback program. Drew has interviewed such personalities as Kathie Lee Gifford, James Brown, Randy Travis, Stephen Baldwin, B.B. King, Aaron Neville and others.
item.itunes:author: Shavar Ross
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: A Prayer of Blessing for You
item.description:
A present day prayer from Shavar. Shavar preps for his "mini" messages for his "Alive Today with Shavar" podcast by praying a special prayer of blessings to his podcast listeners as well as to his blog visitors at: http://www.shavarblog.blogspot.com
Be warned! The simple audio prayer below may change your life! Some of you may know that I'm a praying man and I love to pray. Today I felt like saying a prayer for you whoever you are. However, be warned, as this prayer may not be for you. It is no accident that you stumbled upon this podcast.
Prayer works no matter what you believe. If it's not for you, just trash it, I certainly have no problems with that. You may be here for other reasons.
But know this, God has a purpose and plan for your life that only he understands and he'd like to share with you his plan for life. Hogwash you say? Alright, I'll prove it to you.
1. Click the play button and listen to the simple prayer.
2. Ask God if he's "really real" to reveal himself to you in ANY way as a sign because you sought him by simply listenin' to my prayer.
Do those 2 things and I guarantee you that before the end of this year is out, God will reveal himself to you in such a way that you'll have to come back and tell me what happened to you as a result of your efforts. You see, all you have to do is take a step, God will take two.
So holla back and let me know what's up! I don't pray no wimpy prayers so I'm expecting somethin'. Are you?

item.title: Praying with Confidence
item.description:
Learning the importance of prayer and having the confidence in knowing that God always hears and answers your prayers is extremely vital to your Christian walk.
Even though God is sovereign, there are many things that he won't allow himself to accomplish in the earth realm unless his children intervenes through prayer.
Regarding prayer, simply put: If you don't, God won't.
What you'll learn: 1) How to pray with confidence. 2) Realize that God needs your help in accomplishing things in the earth realm. 3) Understand that God always hears and always answers your prayers.
From Pastor Shavar Ross of The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. October 15, 1996.

item.title: Delivered from Poverty
item.description:
Tired of being broke, busted and disgusted? Shavar gives a fierce and powerful message on how God's children are redeemed from the curse of the law of poverty, sickness and death.
If you truly want the best for your children, why wouldn't God want the best for his...and even more? Just because you're guaranteed a place in heaven doesn't mean you have to have a miserable, poverty-stricken life here on earth. Shavar helps you dissect God's Word and what what it means to be "abundantly supplied".
From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. September 1998.

item.title: The Meaning of Salvation
item.description:
A practical, extremely thorough and sometimes humorous teaching and preaching message on the "true" meaning of salvation. Out of all the prophets who ever lived, what made Jesus so special? Why is he still such an icon today? Take some notes and get ready for a truly knowledgeable study of God's Word.
With a practical and personal approach, Shavar takes you step by step in finding out what Jesus was all about.
From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. March 2, 1997.

item.title: Realizing God's Purpose for Your Life
item.description: Shavar gives practical teaching on how to realize God's purpose for your life. Shavar's 7th sermon to his new church congregation. From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday August 13, 1996.
item.itunes:author: Shavar Ross
item.itunes:summary: Shavar gives practical teaching on how to realize God's purpose for your life. Shavar's 7th sermon to his new church congregation. From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday August 13, 1996.

item.title: The Real Superman: Part 6
item.description: The sixth and final installment from "The Real Superman" series. Shavar's 6th sermon to his new church congregation. Shavar begins to "flow" as preacher as he teaches and preaches the final message on Jesus Christ: The Real Superman. Probably the most structured message of the series from this new preacher. From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday August 6, 1996.
item.itunes:author: Shavar Ross

item.title: The Real Superman: Part 5
item.description: The fifth installment from "The Real Superman" series. Shavar's 5th sermon to his new church congregation. The fire continues to pick up as Shavar teaches and preaches on how Jesus got his power. Probably the most informative of the series. From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday July 30, 1996.

item.title: The Real Superman: Part 4
item.description: The fourth installment from "The Real Superman" series. Shavar's 4th sermon to his new church congregation. The fire really begins to pick up as Shavar teaches and preaches on why Jesus came to earth. From The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday July 23, 1996.

item.title: The Real Superman: Part 1
item.description:
The very first sermon from Pastor Shavar Ross of The Alive Church in Hollywood, California. Tuesday July 2, 1996.
Shavar is best remembered as a child actor. He played "Dudley", Gary Coleman's best friend on the hit 1980's television show "Diff'rent Strokes". Shavar, now 34, has been an actor for well over 20 years and has starred in over 100 film and episodic television productions such as Magnum P. I., MacGyver, Friday The 13th Part 5, Chicago Hope, Designing Women, The Bold and the Beautiful, What's Love Got To Do With It?, Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air, Family Matters, and many more.
After completing 4 years of biblical studies at The Ministry Training Institute, an auxiliary of Crenshaw Christian Center in Los Angeles, Shavar founded The Alive Church in which he pastored for 4 years.
Currently Shavar is a film director, writer and producer and still enjoys inspiring others through his fiery preaching sermons.
